ComicInfo.Penciller: Jason Lutes,Peter Doherty,Chynna Clugston-Major,Adam Warren,Chynna Clugston-Major,Adam Warren,Jason Lutes,Peter Doherty
ComicInfo.Summary: Edgar Rice Burroughs' classic character, Carson of Venus, makes his debut in an all-new adventure by Star Wars writer Darko Macan and Vertigo artist Peter Doherty. Adam Warren continues his adventures of The Dirty Pair. Ed Brubaker (Detour) and Jason Lutes' (Berlin, Jar of Fools) "The Fall" continues, with Kurt getting in way over his head. Finally, a full-length "Blue Monday" adventure by Chynna Clugston-Major (Bloodletting).
ComicInfo.Title: Threadneedle Street; Start the Violence!; The Fall, Part 3
ComicInfo.Writer: Adam Warren,Darko Macan,Ed Brubaker,Chynna Clugston-Major,Chynna Clugston-Major,Adam Warren,Ed Brubaker,Darko Macan
